EmailTemplate.name: Webcast - 30-Day Trial New
EmailTemplate.subject: {{Lead.First Name}}, Are You Ready To Control?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{Lead.First Name}},
With VMTurbo virtual and cloud environments aren’t a struggle. They’re an opportunity for you to step out from the shadows, be the IT genius you’ve always wanted to be—not bogged down with dashboards and reports, but working on game-changing projects with your ever innovative team.
Are you ready to see all that VMTurbo has to offer you? Give the free trial a shot <http://vmturbo.com/download-vmturbo-operations-manager-direct?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wcast_love&utm_content=30_day_offer> and see just how VMTurbo will drive your environment to perpetual health. <http://vmturbo.com/download-vmturbo-operations-manager-direct?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wcast_love&utm_content=30_day_offer> VMTurbo Operations Manager
- Installs in just 15 minutes as a VM appliance, requiring only 20GB storage, 16GB memory, and 4vCPUs - Deploys on any hypervisor, collecting the necessary metrics in just 10 minutes
- Single instance manages 10,000 VMs
- Provides its first specific actionable recommendations in under 1 hour: resize VMs, move VMs, deploy VMs, decommission VMs.
- The VMTurbo Team
